Title: Magnolia
Overview: An epic mosaic of many interrelated characters in search of happiness, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.
Keywords: farewell, regret, parents kids relationship, suicide attempt, becoming an adult, loss of father, dying and death, chance, child prodigy, daughter, unsociability, reconciliation
production_companies: New Line Cinema, Ghoulardi Film Company, The Magnolia Project
Cast: Julianne Moore, William H. Macy, John C. Reilly
